text: Shi an la chuangzao nimen, ranhou gongji nimen [shiwu], ranhou you shi nimen siwang, zuihou [fuhuo ri] you ba nimen fuhuo. Nimen suo wangyan de [an la de] huoban zhong you shei neng zuo zhexie shiqing zhong de renhe yi jian ne? Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
